beach.text: You are a young pirate standing on a sandy beach. Your compass points north to a dark forest. To the east, you see a mysterious cave.

beach_search.text: You dig in the sand and find an old rusty shovel buried deep!

choices.text: Take the shovel and go to forest
Take the shovel and explore cave

forest.text: The dark forest is full of tall trees and mysterious sounds. You see an old oak tree with something carved into it, and a clearing ahead.

oak_tree.text: The oak tree has 'X marks the spot' carved into it, with an arrow pointing down. The ground looks soft here.

dig_hands.text: You dig with your hands but the ground is too hard. You need proper tools to dig here.

dig_shovel.text: You dig with the shovel and find a small wooden chest buried underground! Inside is an ancient golden key.

choices.text: Take the key and continue exploring

clearing.text: In the clearing, you find an old stone temple with a locked golden door. Ancient runes are carved around the entrance.

choices.text: Try to open the golden door

try_temple_door.text: The golden door is locked tight. You need the right key to open it.

read_runes.text: The runes tell the story of an ancient treasure hidden within the temple, protected by a magical lock that only opens with a golden key.

temple_opened.text: The golden key fits perfectly! The door opens to reveal a chamber filled with glittering treasure - gold coins, precious gems, and ancient artifacts!

cave.text: The cave is dark and damp. You hear the sound of dripping water echoing from deep within. There's a narrow passage ahead.

deep_cave.text: Deep in the cave, you find a sleeping dragon guarding a pile of shiny objects! The dragon is blocking the only way forward.

choices.text: Try to sneak past the dragon
Make noise to wake the dragon

dragon_encounter.text: You try to sneak past, but the dragon wakes up! It looks at you curiously rather than angrily. 'I've been waiting for a brave adventurer,' it says.

wake_dragon.text: The dragon wakes up and looks annoyed. 'Who dares disturb my slumber?' it roars, breathing a small puff of smoke.

dragon_talk.text: The dragon smiles (as much as a dragon can smile). 'I have been guarding this magic lamp for centuries. Take it, you seem worthy.'

choices.text: Thank the dragon and take the lamp

victory.text: Congratulations! You found the pirate's treasure and became the richest young pirate on the seven seas! Your adventure ends in glory and gold!

lamp_ending.text: You take the magic lamp and suddenly a friendly genie appears! 'Your wish is my command!' says the genie. You wish for endless adventures and the genie grants it! Your story continues forever!
